gui.perspective.development_warning.desc:
You are running a development build of Perspective.
You may experience some unexpected bugs.
gui.perspective.development_warning.chec: Do not show this screen in future.
name.perspective.sss.title: [Super Secret Settings]:
gui.perspective.config.title: Perspective Config
gui.perspective.config.zoom_level.hover: Sets how zoomed in the game will be when zooming.
gui.perspective.config.overlay_delay.hov: Sets how long the overlay will show when changing the zoom level.
gui.perspective.config.textured_named_en: Toggles functionality of Textured Named Entity.
gui.perspective.config.textured_random_e: Toggles functionality of Textured Random Entity.
gui.perspective.config.allow_april_fools: Allow Perspective's April Fools Prank on April Fools.
gui.perspective.config.force_april_fools: Forces Perspective into thinking it's April Fools.
gui.perspective.config.show_development_: Toggles whether the Development Warning screen is shown on startup.
gui.perspective.config.reset.hover: Sets all config values to default.
gui.perspective.config.back.hover: Saves config and returns to the previous screen.
gui.perspective.config.contribute.hover: Opens the Perspective Github page in your web browser.
gui.perspective.config.bug_report.hover: Opens the Perspective Issues page in your web browser.
resourcepack.perspective.default.name: Perspective Default
